DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate effect different intensity exercise ( moderate vs. intense ) daily energy expenditure overweight adolescent .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Different Intensities Exercise Daily Energy Expenditure With Physical Activity Overweight Boys
DOC.detailed_description: The specific objective : 1 . Assess quantify existence compensatory effect exercise subsequent physical activity . 2 . Compare amount daily physical activity adolescent subject different protocol train intensity .
DOC.criteria: overweight 6th 7th grade student consent form sign parent / tutor diabetes mellitus hypertension report cardiovascular disease
